priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Genetic Region of Interest Type Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C132317

self.title: CDISC SDTM Genetic Region of Interest Type Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the classification of the genetic region under study.
name: Genetic Region of Interest Type
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Genetic Region of Interest Type Terminology

terms.definition: A functional unit of heredity which occupies a specific position on a particular chromosome and serves as the template for a product that contributes to a phenotype or a biological function. (NCI)
A variety of simple 2-5 base pair repeats (e.g., T-A repeats, variable number of tandem repeats (VNTRs), etc.) present within most chromosomes. (NCI)
